title: The Stars Never Rise - Rachel Vincent
description:
From RACHEL VINCENT, New York Times bestselling author, comes the first book in a new series about a girl who must join forces with rogue exorcists to save her sister and, ultimately, humanity. 

Sixteen-year-old Nina Kane should be worrying about her immortal soul, but sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s too busy trying to actually survive. Her townÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s population has been decimated by soul-consuming demons, and souls are in short supply. Watching over her younger sister, Mellie, and scraping together food and money are all that matters. The two of them are a family. They gave up on their deadbeat mom a long time ago.

When Nina discovers that Mellie is keeping a secret that threatens their very existence, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll do anything to protect her. Because in New Temperance, sins are prosecuted as crimes by the brutal Church and its army of black-robed exorcists. And MellieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sin has put her in serious trouble.

To keep them both alive, Nina will need to trust Finn, a fugitive with deep green eyes who has already saved her life once and who might just be an exorcist. But what kind of exorcist wears a hoodie?

Wanted by the Church and hunted by dark forces, Nina knows she canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t survive on her own. She needs Finn and his group of rogue friends just as much as they need her.
